message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed, division. I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.
Your offer is heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split.
Let's find some middle ground. I'll reduce my share to 70%, leaving you with 30%. We're running out of time, and this is a much more reasonable split.
Time is running out Alice, and we both lose if we don't agree.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in your favor.  Let's get this done.
